resources.string: A generic test description. You really want to have something more descriptive here.
Select a module to start testing

Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipiscing elit. Quisque fringilla vitae ligula ac mollis. Nunc lobortis nunc sit amet risus scelerisque, non volutpat sem condimentum. Suspendisse potenti. Aliquam urna lectus, facilisis et mauris et, ultrices pharetra dui. Maecenas auctor massa tortor, quis ultrices orci tempor id. Fusce vel faucibus magna, viverra finibus velit. Curabitur tempus, nisi a fermentum dictum, velit metus dapibus orci, sit amet volutpat odio risus non lectus
The display module houses the LCD screen and the touch sensors.
This test will display test patterns. Check if the pattern matches the description prompted before the pattern.
This test will display test patterns. Check if the pattern matches the description prompted before the pattern.
The battery provides the juice to keep your phone up and running.
This tests checks if the battery is working. Press start to view battery stats.
Battery stats are displayed. Do they look OK?
This module takes all those nice food pictures.
This tests checks if the camera is working. It will show you a preview of the camera picture. If you can see the preview than this test passes.
This test checks if the camera flash is working. Press start and make sure the flash is turned on.
Turn your phone around, the camera flash should be on. Is the flash on?
This module contains the modem, SIM-card slots and more.
This test will display SIM card status. Check if the displayed information is correct.
Is the displayed SIM info correct?
Go to \'Settings -> SIM cards\' to change your SIM card setttings.
This test checks if the microSD slot is working properly. Make sure a microSD card is plugged in and press start.
You should see the SD card status. Is the info correct?
This test checks if the accelerometer is working properly. Press start and tilt your phone in all directions.
You should see the X, Y and Z values change when you tilt your phone. Are the values changing?
Acceleration force along the x axis (including gravity):
Acceleration force along the y axis (including gravity):
Acceleration force along the z axis (including gravity):
This test checks if the magnetometer is working properly. Press start and turn your phone around.
You should see the heading value change when you turn your phone around. Is the value changing?
Geomagnetic field strength along the x axis:
Geomagnetic field strength along the y axis:
Geomagnetic field strength along the z axis:
This test checks if the gyroscope is working properly. Press start and turn your phone around.
Rate of rotation around the x axis:
Rate of rotation around the y axis:
Rate of rotation around the z axis:
This test checks if GPS can determine your location. Press start to test!
This test checks if the buttons are working properly. Press start to test!
This test checks if the wifi is working properly. Press start to test!
This test checks if the modem is working properly. Press start to test!
The receiver module contains joy and happiness and the front camera.
This test checks if the headphone jack is working properly. Press start and plug and unplug your headphones a few times.
This test checks if the LED is working. Press start and make sure you see the LED blinking.
You should see the LED lighting up. Is the LED blinking?
This test tests the proximity sensor. Press start and cover the top half of the phone completely with your hand.
This test checks if the ambient light sensor is working properly. Repeatably cover the top half of your Fairphone, the value read by the sensor should change.
This test checks if the ear speaker is working. Press start and make sure you hear the music playing.
You should hear some music playing. Is the ear speaker working?
Vibration motor, rear speaker, microphone and USB-port: that is what you can find in this module.
This will test if the vibration motor on your phone is working. Once the test starts the vibration motor will start pulsing.
The vibration motor pulse now. Is the vibration motor working?
This test checks if the rear speaker is working. Press start and make sure you hear the music playing.
You should hear some music playing. Is the rear speaker working?
This test checks if the microphone is working. Press start and talk to your phone!
Talk to your phone. Can you hear yourself?
This test checks if the USB port is working. Press start and plug and unplug the USB cable a few times.
